Posts.Content: choca1711 wrote: Hi Ladies, I work together with a charity called "fill-a-heart" foundation. We make beautiful heart-shaped pillows for ladies undergoing breast surgery/underarm surgery. If anyone would like to receive one of these pillows, please send me a pm and I would be happy to send you one. They are, of course, free of charge ! Please feel free to check out the Fill-A-Heart Website: www.fillaheart.org hugs and chocolate xx Dx 4/24/2006, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
